name: Swamp of the FroGroover
description:
Our prince has turned into a frog!

Help him get his groove on and go back to his kingdom.

Hop on the beat, swallow bees and use them against the enemies of the swamp!

A 1D re-imagening of Crypt of the Necrodancer's movement mechanics. 

Made for Mix and Game Jam 2019,

With all original art and soundtrack.

Controls:

- Left / Right to hop

- Space to shoot bees

A game by:

Amir Blum - Programming, Game Design

Itamar Dag - Programming, Game Design

Amit Netanel - Programming

Galit Brawerman - Art

Ofek Mizrahi - Art

Yotam Aluf - Music & SFX

Made with Unity 2019.2.3f1.
